item.title: Prose
item.description: @tailwindcss/typography View on GitHub! Beautiful typographic defaults for HTML you don’t control. The official Tailwind CSS Typography plugin provides a set of prose classes you can use to add beautiful typographic defaults to any vanilla HTML you donâ€™t control, like HTML rendered from Markdown, or pulled from a CMS. Tailwind CSS IntelliSense extension for Visual Studio Code <article class="prose lg:prose-xl"> {{ markdown }} </article> To see what it looks like in action, check out our live demo on Tailwind Play.

item.title: Firstpost
item.description: Still Learning Just making sure that this posts shows up. I love writing about video games and such.

item.title: Resume/CV
item.description: Resume Hi, my name is Joey. I’m a developer based in Montreal, Canada. I have over a decade of experience in software development and have spent the last 7 years making video games and other interactive-media applications. Enthusiast Games, November 2016 - September 2022 In November 2016, after working for several months on a VR first person shooter prototype, I raised private funding to start a video game studio. As a small team, most of my time was able to be spent on development, while still being able to work my Business Development muscles when the time came around, whether it was raising more funding, seeking out deals with publishers, closing licensing deals.
